snippet: BITENSKY--Halina. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Halina Bitensky, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Halina's beloved daughters, Beth (Steven) Myers and Susan (Peter) Lerner; her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: BITENSKY--Halina. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Halina Bitensky, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Halina's beloved daughters, Beth (Steven) Myers and Susan (Peter) Lerner; her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
